park pizza co PLEASE CALL US TO PLACE ANY ORDER OR FOR QUESTIONS REGARDING ORDERING.MONDAY - FRIDAY: 11AM - 10PMSATURDAY: 4PM - 10PMSUNDAY: CLOSED (843) 225-PARK  (843) 225-7275 FOR DELIVERIES: We deliver only to Park Circle and parts of Hanahan$8.00 order minimum + $1.00 delivery charge.  Credit or Debit Only.
